entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Kugaaruk
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 02:24 AM MST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -37.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kugaaruk Airport 06:00 AM MST Saturday 11 February 2023
Temperature: -37.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa falling
Humidity: 68 %
Wind Chill: -54
Dewpoint: -41.0°C
Wind: SW 27 km/h gust 37 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 35.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming sunny near noon. Wind southwest 50 km/h diminishing to 30 early this morning. High minus 35. Wind chill minus 59 this morning and minus 53 this afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 40.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind southwest 30 km/h. Low minus 40. Wind chill near minus 56. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Saturday 11 February 2023
